title: Improvement of the rate capability of all-solid-state cells with Fe-based polysulfide positive electrode materials by modifying the microstructure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7229-7233
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08641K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tomonari Takeuchi, Noboru Taguchi, Mitsunori Kitta, Toyonari Yaji, Misae Otoyama, Kentaro Kuratani, Hikari Sakaebe
We successfully prepared an Fe- and Li-containing polysulfide positive electrode material (Li8FeS5–Li2FeS2 composite) that shows a high specific capacity (>500 mA h g−1) with improved rate capability in all-solid-state cells.
